Package Main.Scores

This package holds the java classes which control and display the ranking of the player. These include HighScore which displays the Top 10 scores for each level and the whole game and ScoreBoard which displays all the scores as a popup after each level and after the game ends.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Highscore
    Public class Highscore is responsible for generating and showing the top 10 highest scores for each level and the total highscore for the game on the Highscore Board which can be reached from the HomeMenu.
    Score
    Class Score is used as a linked list to load and hold the basic information about the player such as ranking, name, level type, time and score after completing a level.
    ScoreBoard
    Public class ScoreBoard is responsible for showing the list of highscores for that level at the end of every level and also the highscores for the whole game at the end of the game.
    ScoreComp
    Class ScoreComp is a comparator to compare the scores and time of all the players to generate a ranking list.
